review: Last year, I bought a small "smart" TV for my kitchen that allowed me to use my Amazon Prime account to watch free movies and TV shows. When they came out with the Fire stick, I was excited because I would now be able to get all this on the other larger TVs in the house. I LOVE LOVE IT! It was very easy to initially set up and I have had no problems using it. I have nothing bad to say about it!
author: CB02864

review: IT'S GREAT FOR TV OR MOVIES AND WORKS SUPER EVERY ONE SHOULD GET ONE!!!!
author: Judy

review: Absolutely the best item ever purchased by our family. Instead of spending money (lots of money) at the show, we can now view both new and older movies for free, with the Amazon Prime membership. It has gotten quite a workout with the end if the football season. I recommend the fire stick and amazon prime to all my friends.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I like it but.......I am always having to reset it. unplugging it, plugging it back in. It gets to became a little bit of a pain.
